name: CONGA CONGA CONGA!
description:
Conga Conga Conga is a game about joining together a conga line and then matching 3 of the same colours by running into people to get them to join the conga line, swapping the positions of the people in the line in order to shorten the conga line, and gain points. Try to gain a high score while avoiding hitting a waiter or the busy crowds and getting thrown out of the club. I hope you enjoy this disco-themed arcade-styled game. 

Controls - Use space bar to select a person in the conga line, use left and right-click to cycle through the people in the line, use space again to select another person which will swap their positions in the line, and use A & D to turn the conga line
